mapper.select: select c.cart_idx ,c.mem_email,c.item_num,c.item_amount,i.item_name,i.item_price,i.item_thumb from cart c inner join item i on c.item_num = i.item_num inner join member m on c.mem_email = m.mem_email where c.mem_email = #{memEmail};
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET item_amount = #{itemAmount} WHERE cart_idx = #{cartIdx};
